name: maxwelton's metafilter front page
description: This changes the front of metafilter a bit, based on the 1/7 implementation of styles when headlines were added. No promises to actually, you know, maintain this, or that it will work for you.
additional_info:
This only affects the front page of metafilter. What this does: 

1) Makes headlines smaller and a light blue to stand out less

2) Indents post content, eliminating line breaks and removing the left indent of block quotes
